t: Aunt Jemima - Wikipedia
s: April 22, 2025 - Due to the "Mammy" stereotype's historical ties to the Jim Crow era, Quaker Oats announced in June 2020 that the Aunt Jemima brand would be discontinued "to make progress toward racial equality", leading to the Aunt Jemima image being removed by the fourth quarter of 2020.

t: Aunt Jemima brand to change name, remove image that Quaker says is 'based on a racial stereotype'
s: Aunt Jemima syrup and pancake mix will get a new name and image. Quaker Oats said it recognizes that "Aunt Jemima's origins are based on a racial stereotype."

t: Aunt Jemima Brand Renamed Pearl Milling Company, Retiring Racist Stereotype : NPR
